CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) were preliminarily investigated , and high shortcircuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and PCE ( 2.71% ) were achieved.

Let's think step by step.
1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is the name of the material being referred to in the paragraph. It is a type of photovoltaic material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) were preliminarily investigated , and high shortcircuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and PCE ( 2.71% ) were achieved.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is a compound or material name, not a property name.
2. Photovoltaic properties: This is a category or class of properties.
3. Shortcircuit current (Isc): This is a property name.
4. 14.87 mA / cm^2: This is a numerical value representing the shortcircuit current property.
5. PCE: This is an abbreviation for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a property name.
6. 2.71%: This is a numerical value representing the PCE property.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is a material name.
2. Photovoltaic properties: This is a category or class of material properties.
3. Shortcircuit current (Isc): This is a material property.
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency): This is a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Shortcircuit current (Isc) |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) were preliminarily investigated , and high shortcircuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and PCE ( 2.71% ) were achieved.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is a compound or material entity, specifically a type of photovoltaic material.
2. 14.87 mA / cm^2: This is a numerical value representing the short-circuit current property of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) material.
3. 2.71%: This is a numerical value representing the Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) property of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 14.87 mA / cm^2: This is a numerical value representing the short-circuit current property of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) material.
2. 2.71%: This is a numerical value representing the Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) property of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 14.87 mA / cm^2 (short-circuit current) |
| 2.71% (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
